que: What is COLLABORATIVE RESEARCH SCHEME (CRS) UNDER TEQIP?
ans: COLLABORATIVE RESEARCH SCHEME (CRS) UNDER TEQIP To provide research grant for young TEQIP faculties recruited in different TEQIP institutes so as to collaborate for research and build research community among TEQIP Faculty, Regular faculty of Project institutions (focus and non-focus) & Premier institutions of the country For More Information : Scheme Document
